definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
KOIKE Yuriko (1952-), Japanese LDP politician, minister of defense during 2008

sentences.english: Lilies are whitest in a blackamoor's hand.
sentences.chinese: 黑人手中的百合花最白。
这是我母亲最喜欢的一品百合。

sentences.english: French Lavender, Lily of the Valley, Oakmoss, Musk.
sentences.chinese: 法国薰衣草，铃兰，橡苔，麝香百合。

sentences.english: Applied K increases the quality of lily freshly cut flower.
sentences.chinese: 施用钾肥提高百合鲜切花的品质。

sentences.english: Conclusions A simple and useful method for DNA extraction from lily'squama leaves are created.
sentences.chinese: 结论该方法提取百合鳞叶总DNA简便实用。

sentences.english: The flowerbeds brim with a mixture of lilies and roses.
sentences.chinese: 花坛里长满了百合和玫瑰。

sentences.english: Gilding the lily leads to insanity.
sentences.chinese: 镀金百合将导致精神病。

sentences.english: Flower door is by GongZhang, lily and red roses.
sentences.chinese: 花门是由红掌，百合和红玫瑰做成的。

sentences.english: Karen plants beautiful roses and lilies in her garden.
sentences.chinese: 凯伦在她的花园里头种满了美丽的玫瑰和百合花。

sentences.english: Lily is a perfect food and drug resource, and its bulb contains rich starch.
sentences.chinese: 百合是理想的药食兼用资源，其鳞茎淀粉含量丰富。

sentences.english: In China people can make a soup with lily bulbs after they are dried up in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，百合的球根晒干后更可用来煮汤。

sentences.english: I thought I would be content to watch the river flow past and drift away on the scent of water lilies.
sentences.chinese: 我想我会满足于看那些河流在水百合的香味中流过。

sentences.english: Due to excellent poleward outflow, NARI intensified at greater than climatological rate last night.
sentences.chinese: 受到极好的极向辐散通道影响，百合在昨晚急速增强。

sentences.english: Just as the angel bears a lily-stem in the Annunciation.
sentences.chinese: 就像《天使报喜图》中手捧百合干枝的天使。

sentences.english: The school ballad I want to recommend is Ye Bai He Ye You Chun Tian.
sentences.chinese: 今天的校园民谣，我选得是《野百合也有春天》。

sentences.english: My favorite houseplant is the peace lily…
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的室内植物就是和平百合。

definition: dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
